title: Highish ping even though I'm close to chicago
body: I was wondering if anyone else had a similar problem and found a way to fix it, I live within an hour and a half from the server, but my ping is 44-50 constantly which seems a little high. It was lower as well (29-33) before our service turned into Spectrum

replies.body:
Even though you're close to Chicago, your network might be having a hard time talking to our game servers specifically. It could be due to a bad ISP route to us, or something like packet loss. Look over the [**Connection Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to see if we can get to the bottom of that ping.

Hit us back up if you have any questions.
